title: Generative AI News & Updates in 2024
description: Title: Generative AI News & Updates in 2024. Description: Explore the transformative world of Generative AI, a cutting-edge technology revolutionising content creation across industries. Learn about its applications in text, image, audio, and video generation. Discover how businesses leverage generative models to enhance productivity, creativity, and innovation. Understand the ethical considerations and future potential of this rapidly evolving field that’s reshaping how we interact with artificial intelligence.

title: Latest News and Stories About Generative AI in 2024
description: Title: Latest News and Stories About Generative AI in 2024. Description: In its last earnings call in September 2024, Accenture announced $1 billion revenue from generative AI, which was a jump from $900 million in the previous quarter.

title: Accenture Hits Record $4.2 Billion in Generative AI Sales
description: Title: Accenture Hits Record $4.2 Billion in Generative AI Sales. Description: In its last earnings call in September 2024, Accenture announced $1 billion revenue from generative AI, which was a jump from $900 million in the previous quarter.

title: Composable Architectures Are Non-Negotiable
description: Title: Composable Architectures Are Non-Negotiable. Description: The modularity of composable architectures enables a low-code or no-code approach, opening AI development to a wider audience and accelerating the adoption of generative AI across industries.

title: How AI Dragons Set GenAI on Fire This Year
description: Title: How AI Dragons Set GenAI on Fire This Year. Description: Predictions for 2025 suggest that AI will become mainstream, speeding up the adoption of cloud-based solutions across industries.
